questions.question: Critical section for two-way shear for isolated sloped footing shall be taken

answers.a: at the face of the column
answers.c: at a distance 'd' from the face of the column
answers.d: at a distance 'd/2' from the face of the column

questions.question: The nominal minimum cover for footing shall be not less than:
The development length check for footing is normally critical in case of:
The size of a footing to support a reinforced concrete column depends upon the

answers.a: grade of concrete in the column
answers.b: load transmitted to the footing by the column
answers.c: safe bearing pressure of the soil

questions.question: The critical section to be considered for checking failure of footing against one way shear is at a distance equal to the

answers.a: larger dimension of the column from its face
answers.c: least lateral dimension of the column
